item.title: Azure Vpn配置
item.description: 创建虚拟网关： https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/vpn-gateway/vpn-gateway-howto-point-to-site-resource-manager-portal 创建根证书和客户端证书： https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/vpn-gateway/vpn-gateway-certificates-point-to-site-makecert 客户端证书安装： https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/vpn-gateway/point-to-site-how-to-vpn-client-install-azure-cert
